subject: Basketball
College Athletics
NCAA Basketball Tournament (Men)
Athletics and Sports
organizations: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University
lead_paragraph: After facing three weeks of headwinds in the Atlantic Coast Conference, Virginia Tech brushed aside No. 9 Miami, 65-47, in the first round of the A.C.C. tournament.
snippet: After facing three weeks of headwinds in the Atlantic Coast Conference, Virginia Tech brushed aside No. 9 Miami, 65-47, in the first round of the A.C.C. tournament.
